name: Cheery Soccer
description:
*** Video at www.gzwo.de ***

With Cheery Soccer you will get an accessible and exciting football game in retro style.

Three levels of difficulty, three levels of speed, World Cup & European Championship tournaments and 48 teams will give you hours of fun!

In training mode, you can try out moves and tactics to defeat your opponents in a later game.

Keywords: Goal, Soccer, Soccer Game, Action Soccer, Sports Game, Football, Fußball, Fussball, Fußballspiel, Fussballspiel, Kicken, Sportspiel, Sport
